Recommendations: 1. To avoid accidents, ie on safety precautions and procedure could be posted in all laboratory rooms.
2. As they say, an ounce of prevention is worth more than a pound of cure, so it is suggesied that a demonstration and training on the proper use of fire extinguishers be conducted annually.
3. There is a need to continuously upgrade laboratory equipment for as long as budget would allow so that the next higher status, that is, Center of Excellence, be achieved.
